body_html: Note that torch.DoubleTensor(1) returns undefined memory. Could you find the specific content of the tensor that gave this error, by printing tensor[0]? I'm not sure if this bug has been fixed in the latest release already.
body_text: Note that torch.DoubleTensor(1) returns undefined memory. Could you find the specific content of the tensor that gave this error, by printing tensor[0]? I'm not sure if this bug has been fixed in the latest release already.
body: Note that `torch.DoubleTensor(1)` returns undefined memory. Could you find the specific content of the tensor that gave this error, by printing `tensor[0]`? I'm not sure if this bug has been fixed in the latest release already.
